reviewText: Initially, I purchased a George & Martha book for my grandsons.  It became the 4 yr old's favorite.  I read it constantly.  Discovered the VCR tapes, bought the 3 I could find (its an old show from the 90s) and they watch them almost exclusively.  The whole family adores George & Martha!  My only complaints are 1) the show isn't on TV anymore and 2) haven't found any DVD cys.

George and Martha are best of friends - and these stories DO feature the recurrent theme of them having realistic fallings-out and resolving them. This tape ALSO contains a hilarious Don King parody. Thus, G&M are not only good role models; these stories are fun for them and their parents to watch.
